name: SurgeryDigestiveSystemUreter
title: Surgery Digestive System Ureter
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Surgery Digestive System Ureter.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Surgery Digestive System Ureter.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Surgery Digestive System Ureter are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Surgery Digestive System Ureter are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)

concept.display: Ureteral endoscopy through ureterotomy, with or without irrigation, instillation, or ureteropyelography, exclusive of radiologic service; with insertion of radioactive substance, with or without biopsy and/or fulguration (not including provision of material)
Endoscopic injection of implant material into the submucosal tissues of the urethra and/or bladder neck
Insertion of a temporary prostatic urethral stent, including urethral measurement

contains.display: Endoscopic injection of implant material into the submucosal tissues of the urethra and/or bladder neck
Insertion of a temporary prostatic urethral stent, including urethral measurement
